attributes.action: request Her Majesty the Queen to use the royal prerogative to dissolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The scandals regarding MPs expenses from all parties has led to an unprecedented lack of confidence amoung the British public in the elected members of the House of Commons which Her Majesty should address by use of the royal prerogative to dissolve Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
